title: Ways of Knowing with Helen Pluckrose
description:
I speak with grievance studies scholar Areo magazine editor Helen Pluckrose on the epistemology behind postmodern and applied postmodern thinking. She is writing a book on the subject that will be released next year

Check our Areo Magazine on twitter @AreoMagazine and https://areomagazine.com

Follow me:
twitter: @AndreaLynnLewis
Instagram: @theother95
Facebook: @theother95page
Email me: theotherninetyfive@gmail.com
